game.name: Dungeon Antiqua 2
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Relive the golden age of dungeon RPGs with Dungeon Antiqua 2! A retro 2D dungeon crawler bursting with SNES nostalgia. Hack, slash, and survive relentless side-view encounters! With 10 jobs and endless skill combos, forge the ultimate party and conquer the depths—if you dare!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Relive the golden age of dungeon RPGs with Dungeon Antiqua 2! A retro 2D dungeon crawler bursting with SNES nostalgia. Hack, slash, and survive relentless side-view encounters! With 10 jobs and endless skill combos, forge the ultimate party and conquer the depths—if you dare!

reviewHighlights.text: The first Dungeon Antiqua was there for me during one of the hardest seasons of my life, my partner's cancer diagnosis. Every night I would come home,...
This game is more on the final fantasy side than it's predecessor. FF5 to be specific. It's a lot of fun.
